document.docAuthor: Kovtunovich, V., Ustjuzhanin, P., Morney, M. De, Udovichenko, P. & Bezverkhov, Yu.
document.masterDocTitle: Fauna of Plume Moths (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae) of Garden Route National Park, South Africa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Fauna of Plume Moths (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae) of Garden Route National Park, South Africa

subSubSection.paragraph:
Agdistis dimetra Meyrick, 1924: 95
( Type locality: South Africa )
Material examined.
1 ♂ , Tsitsikamma ,
06–08.xii.2016
, Kovtunovich V. , Udovichenko P. &
Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution
: South Africa.

Platyptilus farfarellus Zeller, 1867: 334
(Type locality: Poland)

Platyptilia molopias Meyrick, 1906: 135
(Type locality: Sri Lanka)

Platyptilia periacta Meyrick, 1910: 411
( Type locality: Cape Town,
South Africa
)
Platyptilia claripicta Fletcher, 1910: 400
( Type locality: Seychelles )

Platyptilia petila Yano, 1963: 851
(Type locality: Solomon Islands)

Material examined . 1 ♀ , Tsitsikamma, 06–08.xii.2016 , Kovtunovich V., Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution : Europe, Asia,
South Africa
, Swaziland , Madagascar , Mauritius , Uganda , Kenya , Tanzania , Malawi ,
Sao Tomé
Isl., Seychelles , Nigeria , Ghana , Sri Lanka , Indonesia , Philippines .

Mimeseoptilus sabius Felder & Rogenhofer, 1875
: pl. 140, Fig. 60. ( Type locality:
South Africa
). Material examined . 1♀ , Tsitsikamma, 06.–08.xii.2016 , Kovtunovich V., Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution :
South Africa
, Lesotho , Zimbabwe , Zambia , The
Democratic Republic of Congo
, Tanzania , Ethiopia , Swaziland , Malawi .

Pterophorus zophodactylus Duponchel, 1840: 668
. (Type locality: France).
Material examined . 1 ♂ , Tsitsikamma, 06–08.xii.2016 , Kovtunovich V., Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution : Widespread throughout tropical and subtropical regions of the Old World.

Oxyptilus direptalis Walker, 1864: 934
(Type locality: South Africa).

Platyptilia amblydectis Meyrick, 1932: 108
(Type locality: Ethiopia).

Material examined . 1 ♂ , Tsitsikamma, 06–08.xii.2016 , Kovtunovich V., Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution :
South Africa
, Zimbabwe , Malawi , Tanzania , Kenya , Ethiopia .

Oxyptilus vigens Felder & Rogenhofer, 1875
(Type locality: New Zealand, wrong type locality data).
Amblyptilus africae Walsingham, 1881: 278
. (Type locality: South Africa).
Platyptilia maligna Meyrick, 1913: 110
. (Type locality: South Africa). Material examined . 1 ♀, Tsitsikamma, 06–08.xii.2016 ; 1 ♂, 1 ♀, Diepwalle, 04–05.xii.2016 , Kovtunovich V., Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu.

Distribution :
South Africa
, Kenya , Rwanda , Malawi .

Pterophorus wahlbergi Zeller, 1851: 346
( Type locality: South Africa )
.
Pterophorus rutilalis Walker, 1864: 943
( Type locality: Port Natal [now Durban ], South Africa )
.

Oxyptilus rutilans Wollaston, 1879: 441
(Type locality: St. Helena Isl.).

Stenodacma iranella Amsel, 1959: 30
(Type locality: Iran).

Material examined . 4 ex., Tsitsikamma, 06–08.xii.2016 , Kovtunovich V., Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution :
South Africa
, Cameroon , Swaziland , Zimbabwe , Malawi , Tanzania , Kenya , Ghana , Madagascar , Comoros ,
Reunion
Isl., Rodriguez Isl, Mauritius , Seychelles ,
St. Helena
Isl., Saudi Arabia , Iran , Pakistan .

Trichoptilus negotiosus Meyrick, 1926: 325
( Type locality: Witte River, Wellington, South Africa)
.
Buckleria vanderwolfi Gielis, 2008: 49
( Type locality: Tsitsikamma , Republic of South Africa )
.
Material examined . 1 ♂ , Tsitsikamma,
06–08.xii.2016
, Kovtunovich V. , Udovichenko P. &
Bezverkhov Yu. Distribution
: South Africa
.

Pselnophorus astragalotes Meyrick, 1909: 366
( Type locality: South Africa ).
Material examined
. 4 ♂ , 2 ♀ , Tsitsikamma ,
06–08.xii.2016
, Kovtunovich V. , Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu.
; 1 ♂, Knysna, 11.i.2017 , Kovtunovich V. & Ustjuzhanin P.

Distribution :
South Africa
.

Adaina periarga Meyrick, 1913: 267
( Type locality: South Africa ).
Material examined
. 1 ♂ , Diepwalle ,
04–05.xii.2016
;
15 ex., Tsitsikamma ,
06-08.xii.2016
, Kovtunovich V. , Udovichenko P. & Bezverkhov Yu.

Distribution :
South Africa
, Lesotho , Namibia , Malawi .
